CHAT.comment: DORETHA H. HENDERSON, AUTHORIZED REPRESENTATIVE OF DAVID L. HENDERSON, DECEASED, Petitioner v. ERIC K. SHINSEKI, SECRETARY OF VETERANS AFFAIRS
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LISA S. BLATT ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ERIC D. MILLER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF LISA S. BLATT ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:04 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
